ygData.subject: RE: Re:What to buy?
ygData.msgSnippet: I know it s been said before, but it bears repeating. Save every lightstone and greater lightstone you get.  Go to North Karana, and turn them in to the Gypsy
ygData.messageBody:
I know it's been said before, but it bears repeating.

Save every lightstone and greater lightstone you get. Go to North Karana,
and turn them in to the Gypsy - you get experience for both, and for the
greater lightstones you get a research container worth about 8-10 pp
depending on your faction.

A monk in my guild did this and went from 11-14 and made about 300 pp for a
weeks work, which is not bad for a 11-14 character. It's sometimes worth
even buying Greaters for 6 or 7 pp from others.

-----Original Message-----
From: Andy Sands [mailto:andy.sands@...]
Sent: Monday, February 07, 2000 1:21 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Re:What to buy?

From: Andy Sands <andy.sands@...>

At 15:20 06/02/00 -0500, you wrote:
>Onyx earrings (2 agi) 5pp or so from Blackburrow

Excellent, an answer to my original question finally :) I
did actually
request suggestions for my earring / ring slots!

>The Wu's gauntlets is not worth the money for him right
now.

And I already have Wu's, I don't think my first post read
very well though!

Thanks for wisp hint Nick..

--
Herrick of Quellious [Champions of Justice]
13th Circle
Bristlebane

E-mail: andy@...
